title: Through my eyes: Kilkenny Primary School, South Australia
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Teachers - In service training

Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Education - South Australia
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Open plan schools - Australia
description: Kilkenny Primary School is an open-plan school in Adelaide. A bright decor with red carpets, a straw covered ceiling, and splashes of bright colors provides the setting for the activities of senior primary pupils and their teachers. The implementation of a team teaching approach, individual and group work, and the integration of activities and ideas are illustrated in the film. (Teacher education)
